name: Floral Printed Kurti
description: Vibrant floral print cotton kurti, perfect for daily wear and festive occasions. Made from breathable fabric, lightweight and comfortable.

name: Blue Denim Jeans
description: Classic slim-fit denim jeans for men, comfortable and stylish for all occasions. Premium quality denim with stretch for comfort.

name: Kids Sneakers
description: Lightweight and durable sneakers for active kids, with cushioned soles and velcro straps for easy wear.

name: Red Banarasi Saree
description: Exquisite Banarasi silk saree with zari work, perfect for weddings and festivals. Rich golden border with intricate weaving.

name: Men's Ethnic Kurta
description: Traditional cotton kurta with intricate embroidery, ideal for festive wear. Soft fabric with comfortable fit.

name: Women's Block Heels
description: Elegant block heel sandals, comfortable for long wear with any outfit. Premium synthetic leather upper.

name: Girls Lehenga Choli
description: Beautiful embroidered lehenga choli for little girls, perfect for celebrations, birthdays and festivals.

name: Men's Casual Shirt
description: Slim-fit casual shirt in premium cotton, versatile for office or casual outings. Easy-iron fabric.

name: Women's Wrap Dress
description: Flowy wrap dress in chiffon fabric, elegant and easy to style for casual and semi-formal occasions.

name: Men's Sports Shoes
description: High-performance running shoes with air cushion soles for maximum comfort during workouts and daily wear.

name: Cotton Palazzo Pants
description: Comfortable wide-leg palazzo pants in soft cotton, great for summer. Pair with kurtis or tops.

name: Kids Party Dress
description: Adorable tutu party dress with sequin details for little girls. Perfect for birthdays and special occasions.

name: Anarkali Suit Set
description: Gorgeous Anarkali suit with matching dupatta in georgette fabric. A stunning ethnic look for all occasions.

name: Denim Jacket Unisex
description: Trendy denim jacket with washed effect, a wardrobe staple for all seasons. Fits men and women.

name: Kolhapuri Sandals
description: Handcrafted traditional Kolhapuri chappal in genuine leather with intricate toe-strap design.

name: Men's Slim Chinos
description: Premium slim-fit chino pants, perfect for casual and semi-formal occasions. Wrinkle-resistant fabric.

name: Embroidered Dupatta
description: Hand-embroidered pure silk dupatta with mirror work, a perfect accent to any ethnic outfit.

name: Women's Training Shoes
description: Lightweight training shoes with breathable mesh upper for workouts and everyday wear.

name: Kids Cartoon T-Shirt
description: Fun and colorful cartoon printed t-shirt for kids in soft breathable cotton. Machine washable.

name: Women's Power Blazer
description: Structured formal blazer for the modern working woman. Tailored fit with a premium matte finish lining.
